meanings.definition: A person who owns or manages a farm.
meanings.sent1: The farmers worked hard to grow crops on their land.
meanings.sent2: Many farmers in the area raise livestock such as cows and chickens.
meanings.sent3: The farmers joked that their vegetables were so fresh, they practically jumped out of the ground!
meanings.sent4: The farmers were the backbone of the community, nurturing the land like parents to children.
meanings.sent5: The image of farmers tending to their fields under the golden sun was picturesque.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of farmers harvesting wheat in the fields.
meanings.sent2: The farmers gathered at the market to sell their produce.
meanings.sent3: The farmers decided to have a friendly competition to see who could grow the tallest sunflower.
meanings.sent4: The farmers stood united, a force to be reckoned with in the agricultural world.
meanings.sent5: The sight of farmers working together in harmony was a testament to their strong community bonds.
